name: Amber Wand

attributes.Augments: Rage of the Skies -> +10% Critical Extra Damage

notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Cobra Wand
notes:
Notes
This wand can't be imbued with additional critical strike imbuements.

name: Deepling Ceremonial Dagger
notes:
Notes
Among the most powerful weapons available for a sub-200 mage, comparable to the Energized Limb (which does higher damage but has shorter range). Both Druids and sorcerers can use this weapon and (alongside it's upgrade, the Deepling Fork).
It is impossible to imbue this item with critical hit imbuements.

name: Deepling Fork
notes:
Notes
An upgrade of sorts from the Deepling Ceremonial Dagger. It's one of the few weapons that come with a Critical hit chance out of the box (It's also impossible to imbue it with additional critical hit chance).

name: Draining Inferniarch Wand
notes:
Notes
Part of the Inferniarch Set, can be obtained vua the Doomforge by using an Inferniarch Wand.
None of the Draining Inferniarch weapons can be imbued with Basic, Intricate, or Powerful Vampirism.

name: Dream Blossom Staff
notes:
Notes
It is notable for being one of the few magical weapons usable by both sorcerers and druids. For a sorcerer, it is an straight downgrade from Wand of Defiance, compared to which it deals less damage per shot but has otherwise identical stats (save for the two imbuement slots). For a druid, it is a rather valuable weapon though, as it deals energy damage which they otherwise have a very limited access to. It has two imbuement slots, but it cannot be imbued with Critical Hit, only Mana Leech, Hit Points Leech and Magic Level. Provides 4 sqm of blue light.

name: Eldritch Wand

attributes.Attributes: magic level +2, fire magic level +1, perfect shot +65 at range 4

notes:
Notes
The 65 perfect shot fire damage ignores armor and resistance, but if the creature is immune to fire it won't take damage. 
It has the strongest base damage of all wands when hitting creatures at range 4.

name: Energized Limb
notes:
Notes
Among the most powerful weapons available for a sub-200 mage, comparable to the Deepling Ceremonial Dagger (which does less damage but has longer range). Both Druids and Sorcerers can use this weapon and it's the only fire based rod available for the former.
It is not possible to imbue this item with critical hit imbuements.

name: Falcon Wand
notes:
Notes
Falcon Wand, Soultainter, Lion Wand and Wand of Destruction are the only wands that may be imbued with Critical Hit imbuements (Basic, Intricate and Powerful Strike).

name: Ferumbras' Staff (Enchanted)
notes:
Notes
It is an enchanted Ferumbras' Staff (Blunt). It will become a Ferumbras' Staff (Blunt) again after 12 hours.

name: Ferumbras' Staff (Failed)
notes:
Notes
It is obtained after a failed attempt to enchant Ferumbras' Staff (Blunt). It will become a Ferumbras' Staff (Blunt) again after 12 hours.
It is slightly worse than a Wand of Defiance.

name: Gilded Eldritch Wand

attributes.Attributes: magic level +2, fire magic level +1, perfect shot +65 at range 4

notes:
Notes
It works just like a standard Eldritch Wand.

name: Grand Sanguine Coil

attributes.Augments: Hell's Core -> +6% base damage, Energy Wave -> +8% base damage
attributes.Attributes: magic level +5, fire magic level +1, energy magic level +1

notes:
Notes
It is part of the Sanguine Set. This item is not dropped by any creatures or bosses but it can be obtained from a Bag You Covet dropped by Bakragore when fighting him under the influence of Bakragore's Burden.

name: Inferniarch Wand
notes:
Notes
Part of the Inferniarch Set, can be used in the Doomforge to be turned into either a Siphoning Inferniarch Wand, Rending Inferniarch Wand, or Draining Inferniarch Wand.

name: Jungle Wand
notes:
Notes
This wand can be imbued with Basic Strike and Intricate Strike imbuements.It's part of the Jungle Set.

name: Lion Wand
notes:
Notes
This item cannot be imbued with Vampirism imbuements.

name: Naga Wand
notes:
Notes
It's part of the Naga Set.

name: Rending Inferniarch Wand
notes:
Notes
Part of the Inferniarch Set, can be obtained vua the Doomforge by using an Inferniarch Wand.
None of the Rending Inferniarch weapons can be imbued with Basic, Intricate, or Powerful Strike.

name: Sanguine Coil

attributes.Augments: Hell's Core -> +3% base damage, Energy Wave -> +4% base damage
attributes.Attributes: magic level +5, fire magic level +1, energy magic level +1

notes:
Notes
It is part of the Sanguine Set. This item is not dropped by any creatures or bosses but it can be obtained from a Bag You Covet, which can be looted from any boss in the 4 areas of the Rotten Blood Quest if some conditions are met. Can also be obtained through a Crimson Offering.

name: Shimmer Wand
notes:
Notes
Seems to have similar power to Wand of Starstorm with higher level requirement due to 1 sqm longer range. It's a good choice when you want to keep longer distance from creatures while running away or hunting in team, but it will last only 7 days.

Can be obtained by transforming Shimmer Swimmer using it on Broken Ring of Ending. Upon creating one, you will receive the following message: Holding the broken ring of ending near the surprisingly lively eyes of the shimmer swimmer suddenly transforms him into a wand!

name: Siphoning Inferniarch Wand
notes:
Notes
Part of the Inferniarch Set, can be obtained vua the Doomforge by using an Inferniarch Wand.
None of the Siphoning Inferniarch weapons can be imbued with Basic, Intricate, or Powerful Void.

name: Sorcerer Test Weapon Test
notes:
Notes
This is believed to be an Unobtainable Item.

name: Sorcerer and Druid Staff
notes:
Notes
It looks the same as a Wand of Vortex and Xodet's First Wand.

name: Soultainter
notes:
Notes
This wand can be imbued with Strike Imbuements. It's part of the Soul Set and currently the best Wand in the game.
It is a possible reward of the Soul War Quest, which guarantees one random item from the Soul Set the first time said quest is completed.
This item is not dropped by any creatures or bosses but it can be obtained from a Bag You Desire, which can be looted from any enemy or boss in the 5 areas of the Soul War Quest if some conditions are met.

name: The Scorcher
notes:
Notes
The weakest of all wands. You receive it to practice the Sorcerer vocation on Dawnport. You cannot take it with yourself to the Mainland, however some people still own multiple copies there from exploiting the bugs in the beginning of Dawnport existence.

name: Wand of Cosmic Energy
notes:
Notes
An upgrade from the Wand of Decay and the Wand of Draconia that makes them both largely obsolete, since, in addition to dealing more damage per shot, energy is considered to be a more useful element than fire and, at least at a lower level, death. It is the sorcerer's equivalent of the druid's Terra Rod. 
Reward in The Paradox Tower Quest.
Needed for Mage Outfits Quest (male) and Summoner Outfits Quest (female).

name: Wand of Darkness
notes:
Notes
Master sorcerers can create a Wand of Darkness by casting the Conjure Wand of Darkness spell. It was the strongest death damage-dealing magical weapon in the game until the introduction of the Soultainter. Even though it can be used as early as level 41, thanks to its high base damage output and powerful bonuses, it rivals the highest-levelled wands and rods. However, it is a temporary weapon and will disappear after 15 minutes or after 250 shots.

name: Wand of Decay
notes:
Notes
An upgrade from the Wand of Dragonbreath and the sorcerer's equivalent of the druid's Necrotic Rod. However, many sorcerers prefer to wait until they can use the Wand of Draconia, since at a lower level fire is a more useful element than death. Provides 2 sqm of green light. Wands of Decay replaced  Wands of Plague in the Winter Update 2007.
Needed for Mage Outfits Quest (male) and Summoner Outfits Quest (female).

name: Wand of Defiance
notes:
Notes
It is the sorcerer's equivalent of the druid's Muck Rod and the energy damage counterpart to the Wand of Everblazing. A very powerful wand commonly used by mid to high level sorcerers and a direct upgrade from the Wand of Starstorm. It has a longer attack range than any of the lower-levelled wands and also increases the wielder's magic level by 1. Together with the Wand of Everblazing it was the best weapon for a sorcerer until the introduction of the Dream Blossom Staff, which deals less damage per shot, but used to have a higher magic level bonus and a longer attack range prior to being nerfed.

name: Wand of Destruction Test
notes:
Notes
This is believed to be an Unobtainable Item.

name: Wand of Destruction
notes:
Notes
Yana will trade you one for 50 Gold Tokens. Wand of Destruction, Falcon Wand, Lion Wand and Soultainter are the only wands that may be imbued with Critical Hit imbuements (Basic, Intricate and Powerful Strike).

name: Wand of Dimensions
notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Wand of Draconia
notes:
Notes
The sorcerer's equivalent of the druid's Northwind Rod and the fire damage counterpart to the Wand of Decay, which typically makes it more valuable, as, at a lower level, fire is a more useful element than death.

name: Wand of Dragonbreath
notes:
Notes
An upgrade from the Wand of Vortex and the second weakest wand available on the mainland. It is the sorcerer's equivalent of the druid's Moonlight Rod. Provides 2 sqm of red light. Wands of Dragonbreath replaced  Red Spell Wands in the Winter Update 2005.
Needed for Mage Outfits Quest (male) and Summoner Outfits Quest (female).

name: Wand of Everblazing
notes:
Notes
It is the sorcerer's equivalent of the druid's Glacial Rod and the fire damage counterpart to the Wand of Defiance. A very powerful wand commonly used by mid to high level sorcerers and a direct upgrade from the Wand of Inferno. It has a longer attack range than any of the lower-levelled wands and also increases the wielder's magic level by 1. Together with the Wand of Defiance it was the best weapon for a sorcerer until the introduction of the Dream Blossom Staff, which deals less damage per shot, but has a higher magic level bonus and a longer attack range.

name: Wand of Inferno
notes:
Notes
An upgrade from the Wand of Cosmic Energy and the sorcerer's equivalent of the druid's Hailstorm Rod. It is the fire damage counterpart to the Wand of Starstorm and the Wand of Voodoo. Wands of Inferno replaced  Ritual Wands in the Winter Update 2005.
Needed for Mage Outfits Quest (male) and Summoner Outfits Quest (female).

name: Wand of Starstorm
notes:
Notes
The sorcerer's equivalent of the druid's Springsprout Rod and the energy damage counterpart to the Wand of Inferno and the Wand of Voodoo.

name: Wand of Voodoo
notes:
Notes
The sorcerer's equivalent of the druid's Underworld Rod and the death damage counterpart to the Wand of Inferno and the Wand of Starstorm.

name: Wand of Vortex
notes:
Notes
The sorcerer's equivalent of the druid's Snakebite Rod and the lowest-levelled wand available on the mainland. Provides 2 sqm of blue light. A rather effective weapon, as low level monsters are usually not resistant to energy damage. Wands of Vortex replaced  Blue Spell Wands in the Winter Update 2005. Looks the same as Xodet's First Wand and the Sorc and Druid Staff.
Needed for Mage Outfits Quest (male) and Summoner Outfits Quest (female).
